title: VTable Implementation Project Structure in Construct Web App
description: The VTable implementation in the construct web app should follow a similar structure to the source project but with adaptations for the new environment.

migrationPlan.overview: Create a new tables page and component structure in the construct web app that maintains the modular approach of the source project while integrating with the existing construct project structure.

steps.description: Create a new tables page at apps/web/src/app/tables/page.tsx
Create a VTable component directory structure at apps/web/src/app/components/VTable/
Create a UI package in packages/ui/ for shadcn/ui components used by VTable
Mirror the component structure of the source project with main component, types, state, and subcomponents

openQuestions: Should we maintain the same file structure or adapt it for better integration with the construct project?
Should we keep the VTable component in the components directory or create a separate directory for it?
